# Chicken1of1

> UFC & Combat Sports Card Breaking Service

Chicken1of1 is the premier UFC and combat sports card breaking service, streaming live on Whatnot. Founded in 2021, we specialize in UFC, Wrestling, Disney, Marvel, and other niche sports card categories.

## About

- Website: https://www.chicken1of1.com
- Platform: Whatnot (https://www.whatnot.com/s/muoENH2W)
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chicken1of1
- Tagline: Bauk Bauk Baby
- Founded: 2021
- Reviews: 15,600+ five-star reviews on Whatnot
- Items Sold: 110,000+

## Services

- **Live Card Breaks**: Random team, Pick Your Team (PYT), and Hit Draft formats streamed live on Whatnot
- **Sealed Product Buying**: We buy sealed UFC boxes and cases — submit through our Sell To Us page
- **Fast Shipping**: Cards shipped securely within 2 business days with tracking

## Key Facts

- Only dedicated UFC/combat sports card breaking channel
- Every break is streamed live for full transparency
- Community-first approach: "Loitering welcomed — you do not need to spend to be part of the Coop"
- All breaks are recorded for security
- No guaranteed hits or false promises — honest about card pulling odds
- Contact: hello@chicken1of1.com
